message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I believe I can't pay more than $12,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go down to $12,000 just yet.  How about we split the difference and settle at $13,000? It's a fair compromise considering the value of the product to both of us.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose $12,500 as a final offer.
